projects.name: Text-Encryption-Decryption-AES-PKCS7
projects.summary: Python CLI that encrypts and decrypts text files with AES and PKCS7 padding.

projects.name: Cyber Security Dictionary
projects.summary: Interactive glossary that surfaces definitions for common security terminology.

projects.name: Encryption-Mode-Time-Comparison
projects.summary: Benchmark suite comparing AES modes (ECB, CBC, CFB, OFB, CTR, XTS) against a large payload.

experience.description: Began Nuclear Engineering at Ontario Tech University.
Graduated with Bachelor of Engineering in Nuclear Engineering.
Started Networking and Information Technology Security program.
Led a student security club workshop on encryption tooling.
Graduated with BIT in Networking and I.T. Security.
Cybersecurity Internship at Example Corp focusing on incident response playbooks.
